code: import uuid from'uuid';import{SET_ALERT,REMOVE_ALERT}from'./consts';export var setAlert=function setAlert(msg,alertType){var timeout=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:5000;return function(dispatch){var id=uuid.v4();dispatch({type:SET_ALERT,data:{msg:msg,alertType:alertType,id:id}});setTimeout(function(){return dispatch({type:REMOVE_ALERT,data:id});},timeout);};};
